ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Crawl Hang on Filesystem Full
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix doesn t behave well when the filesystem is full. We need to fix this.  I ve opened a new issue,

Heritrix doesn't behave well when the filesystem is full. We need to fix 
this.  I've opened a new issue, 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1203646&group_id=73833&atid=539102, 
so we look at making is so Heritrix behaves better in disk-full 
situations and so it will continuing crawling after disk space has been 
freed.

Thank you Jay for reporting the below.

(You might checkout the LowDiskProcessor.  It might help you avoid the 
below issue altogether).

Yours,
St.Ack



Jay wrote:

> Hello Folks,
>
> Eventhough it is not the end of the world, I thought I post it for our
> developers.  I am using CVS head from like couple of weeks back before
> you guys announce 1.4
>
> If file system got full, crawl hang and i got the following messages
> in the alert (lots of them).  Eventhough I make space on the file
> system, crawl never come back to normal stage.  I tried to pause it,
> get the same message.  Never paused either.
>
> Problem java.util.NoSuchElementException: Timeout waiting for idle
> object occured when trying to process 'http://xxxx.com/index.htm' 
> <http://xxxx.com/index.htm%27> at
> step ABOUT_TO_BEGIN_PROCESSOR in Archiver
>
>
> Associated Throwable: java.util.NoSuchElementException: Timeout
> waiting for idle object
>
>   Message:
>     Timeout waiting for idle object
>
>   Stacktrace:
> java.util.NoSuchElementException: Timeout waiting for idle object
>       at
> org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericObjectPool.borrowObject(GenericObjectPool.java:756)
>       at
> org.archive.io.arc.ARCWriterPool.borrowARCWriter(ARCWriterPool.java:143)
>       at
> org.archive.crawler.writer.ARCWriterProcessor.write(ARCWriterProcessor.java:419)
>       at
> org.archive.crawler.writer.ARCWriterProcessor.writeHttp(ARCWriterProcessor.java:379)
>       at
> org.archive.crawler.writer.ARCWriterProcessor.innerProcess(ARCWriterProcessor.java:356)
>       at 
> org.archive.crawler.framework.Processor.process(Processor.java:103)
>       at
> org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.processCrawlUri(ToeThread.java:273)
>       at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:143)
>
>
